commitResults.messageTitle: Handle case where user gives an input which does not contain any of the keywords.
Automated Text UI Testing. Use the input/output redirection technique to semi-automate the testing of Intrubot.
Teach Duke to deal with errors such as incorrect inputs entered by the user and refactored duke file
Updated test suite to cover exception scenerios
Add support for deleting tasks from the list.
Updated test suite to cover deletion feature and also error handling scenerios for deletion feature.
Add Save Feature to persist task history
commitResults.messageBody:
Intrubot does not have any means to persist tasks history across different sessions.

DataSaver class introduced to handle saving and loading of task history across sessions. Modify Task class and its subclasses with secondary constructors to accept more parameters for initialization.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add date and times feature for Deadline and Event classes
commitResults.messageBody:
String representation of time are not standardized and user dependent.

LocalDate used to store time in Event and Deadline classes.

Format of time is now standardized and ready for parsing and manipulation by Intrubot.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor the code to extract out closely related code as classes.
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke class file is increasingly convoluted with similar logic for different function including from Ui, Storage, Command, Parser and  Tasklist

Extract logically similar code into common components into the following:
* Ui : handle reading user input and render responses
* Storage: Read and Write TaskList Items to Local Memory
* Command: Execute different logic based on command specifed
* Parser: Parse user input into their commands and arguments
*TaskLists: contains the task list

Abstract logically similar component for easier extensibility

Source package is increasingly cluttered and difficult to navigate

Organize the classes into suitable java packages.

Related Classes are group together to allow information hiding via package access modifier

Individual classes and methods are not are tested independently of other classes.

*Unit test written for Storage class under 2 scenarios loading data and reading from file if filepath is absent.
*Unit test for output stream for Ui class of  bye command

Unit testing: testing individual units ensure that event the smallest component works correctly.

User is unable to query items from task list.

Add FindCommand class which extract tasks containing queried term.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaDoc comments to the code.
commitResults.messageBody:
Public classes and methods do not have JavaDocs which hinder readability.

Add header comments to all non-private classes/methods, and non-trivial private methods.

commitResults.messageTitle: Tweak code to follow the Coding Standard
commitResults.messageBody:
Code does not comply with coding standard which could hinder readability and collaboration with other developers.

Coding standard has been tweaked to follow: https://se-education.org/guides/conventions/java/intermediate.html#package-and-import-statements

Allow others familiar with coding standard to understand the repository better.

Building the from source code and running testcases can be a and be tedious multi-step process.

Gradle integration saves precious development time and labour.

Gradle is being used to automate building and running of Duke. It is also set up to run the whole test suite of unit tests.

This saves the number of clicks to run duke and unit tests.

Use Gradle to automate some of the build tasks of the project.

GUI is running solely in the command line with no graphical user interface.

A purely CLI interface may not be as user-friendly as a GUI interface which
more users would be accustomed to.

Use the JavaFX technology to implement the GUI. View of the application is
rendered using FXML which is manipulated using by Controller classes
MainWindow and DialogBox.

To add sub nodes individually to the main node for building the view is
harder to visualize and makes code more verbose.

commitResults.messageTitle: Format code to adhere to coding standards
commitResults.messageBody:
New code added for this week's increments were not adhering to the coding standards.

Add Javadoc's, remove a few white spaces across multiple files, reorder import statements among other adjustments.

Code is now cleaner, easier to read for people familiar with the coding standard.

commitResults.messageTitle: Use assert feature  to document important assumptions throughout code
commitResults.messageBody:
Codebase is not supported by assertions to guard against unexpected
values and state.

Implement several assertions such as but not limited to:
*Assertion is used to verify tasklist length for store operations.
*Assertion is also checks precondition for Delete command from tasklist.

Verify that code hold up to assumptions and reduce cases program state
causing unexpected bugs.

Code difficult to read due to unabstracted logic, unclear comments.

Improve the code quality by the following:
* Eliminate magic numbers and strings.
* Shorten methods like parse.
* Reduce depth of nesting in parse.
* Rename variables.
* SLAP applied to parse.
* Use default branch in conditionals.
* Rephrase comments.

Code is more readable and less error prone.

Code difficult to read due to unabstracted logic, unclear comments.

Improve the code quality by the following:
* Eliminate more  magic numbers and strings.

Code is more readable and less error prone.

Duplicate tasks can be added to the tasklist.

Add the ability to recognize and deal with duplicate items,
by refusing addition of duplicated tasks which share the
same description and timings.

All tasks moving forward is unique and not redundant.

Intrubot only stores tasks information.

User may want to store trivia data.

Store questions and answers which can
be deleted.

Able to save duplicate trivia and unable to search for
trivia.

*Modify trivia command to handle duplicates.
*Modify trivia class to have question and answer
in description.

*Allow trivia to be found using search
functionality.

Ui of GUI can be more appealing.

*Update greeting message.
*Update styling.
